title: sharp typeface
content:
hello, i was hoping someone could help suggest a few fonts for me  
i am looking for a font that implies "sharp" "glass" "crisp"... so far i have been playing with engraverlike sans serifs really spaced out. but i guess i am looking for something with a bit more character. what i dont want is a very illustrated font with like glass peices coming out at all sides. it should be a but more elegant a suggestive of "sharpness"  
i hope im making sense...

comments.content: If you need a serif supporting text font option, Fortescue by [Colophon](http://web.archive.org/web/20100306153255/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/) is rather sharp.
hey penn, thanks for the suggestion. i am actually only looking for a font to set "sharp" in

Lirico comes to my mind.
